text:
ExecVision | Technical QA Manager | Arlington, VA | Full-time, Onsite

ExecVision is a leading conversation analytics and intelligence company, working with sales calls to increase sales efficiency and to reduce onboarding time.

We are looking for a technical QA Manager - you'll be supervising an offshore team of QA engineers to keep the release cycle moving, and ensure high quality product deliveries. Experience with test automation, load testing, security testing, SQL all highly useful.

careers@execvision.io
